New Records: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam, breaking the game open for the Guardians.
Tarik Skubal gave up his first home run of the playoffs, ending his streak of 17 scoreless innings in the postseason.
Key Match Events: Lane Thomas' grand slam in the fifth inning was the turning point of the game.
Tarik Skubal's first home run of the playoffs led to a significant loss for the Tigers.
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch expressed pride in the team's effort but acknowledged the loss as a setback.
The Guardians advanced to the ALCS, while the Tigers' season ended after a 10-year playoff drought.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers missed opportunities to score late in the game, leaving many runners on base.
The article mentions the Tigers' future prospects and their determination to return to the playoffs.
